item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

I’m Angad Muthyala, a final-year Computer Science student graduating in April 2026. I’m passionate about backend development and AI-driven workflows, with a strong interest in languages like Go and Python. I’ve built projects that combine scalable systems with intelligent applications, and I’m now contributing to the open-source community as part of my belief in collaboration and knowledge sharing.

Technical Skills

Languages: Python, Golang, C++

Frameworks/Tools: Flask, FastAPI, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Node.js, Git

item.title: Community
item.description:
Community & Leadership

I’m passionate about building tech communities and helping others get started with open-source contributions and development.

FossUnited - Campus Lead

Founding and Leading FOSS Culture

  • Founded and lead a FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) student club
  • Conducted workshops and hackathons promoting OSS culture
  • Enabled students to contribute to open-source for the first time
  • Organized events to introduce students to the world of open-source development
  • Built a community focused on collaborative learning and contribution

More Info

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Get In Touch

I’m always interested in discussing new opportunities, collaborating on interesting projects, or just having a conversation about technology and development.

Contact Information

Email: angadmuthyala@gmail.com
Phone: +91-8779263718
Location: Mumbai, India

Connect Online

GitHub: AngadVM
View my code, contributions, and open-source projects

LinkedIn: angad-muthyala
Let’s connect professionally and stay in touch

What I’m Looking For

  • Software Engineering roles in backend development
  • Machine Learning opportunities in AI/ML applications
  • Data Science positions involving data-centric solutions
  • Open-source collaboration on interesting projects
  • Community building and technical mentorship opportunities

Current Status

  • Graduating: April 2026 from Computer Science program
  • Available for: Internships, part-time opportunities, and project collaborations
  • Interested in: Full-time opportunities starting from 2026

Response Time

I typically respond to emails within 24 hours. For urgent matters, feel free to reach out via LinkedIn as well.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Projects

Here are some of the key projects I’ve built, focusing on AI, backend systems, and data-centric applications.

Newsletter Agent

Automated AI Newsletter Generator

Built an AI-powered agent that scrapes, summarizes, and distributes tech updates from Stack Overflow.

  • Integrated LangGraph for control flow
  • Used ChromaDB for vector indexing
  • Implemented SendGrid for seamless email dispatch
  • Automated content curation and distribution pipeline

View on GitHub

AI-Based Security Log Analyzer

Real-Time Threat Detection Engine
